extendedInfo.description: You can set a image from your phone to be the background.  Also you can set a countdown to a special date.  Like an anniversary, birthday, graduation, wedding etc.  You can change the color of the text so it does not blend into the image.  The widgets are resizable if you have 3.1 or greater OS.  See the screenshots for the Widget looks like.The Widget only updates the day once a day.  So it will not drain your battery.Please report any bugs or features before leaving any reviews.**********************Click on the developer website in developer contact details to get help on the application:http://www.goo.gl/lWvpX********************************Features that are requested**Ability to choose text size**Ability to choose format of date(UK)**Round corners of the widget**Option to count down days hours mins secs

reviews.title: But!
reviews.comment: I love this my kids love this we all love it it\'s fab BUT after an hour the text on the picture (date text n count down)  goes large and it won\'t go back small unless u delete it n set up again?!
reviews.author: Helen Gravestock

reviews.title: Didn\'t download properly!
reviews.comment: It didn\'t download properly, I have looked everywhere in the apps and widget section. It looks like a promising app, I just wish it would work!
reviews.author: Laura Hunt

reviews.title: Works like a charm!
reviews.comment: Really love this countdown widget to see how many days left till my darling\'s homecoming. Guys, this is not an app, but a widget. So please do not expect to see this under the app section. This app deserves 5 stars!!!
reviews.author: Anthony Voon

reviews.title: S2 problems
reviews.comment: Thought it was just me..... it does not work in the Galaxy S systems. You download it and it says complete and then you go to open it in widgets and its no where to be found. Restarted my phone as well.... still nothing. Lame.
reviews.author: Eriqah R. Foreman Williams

reviews.title: Excellent...
reviews.comment: Just one downside, photos tend to lose their quality and go slightly pixely when used on the widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This widget tho.
reviews.comment: Its works fine and all, but no matter what picture I upload it\'s always blurry. .
reviews.author: Norma Machado

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Not sure what the other users issues are but this app works GREAT on my HTC Amaze! I was able to put my daughters\' pictures with the days remaining until their birthdays. It is a WIDGET people, you have to long press on your homescreen to open it, it doesn\'t open from your app drawer.
reviews.author: Rachel Miller

reviews.title: Yeah, doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Will install in my phone but it\'s nowhere to be found. I just want an app that I can use pictures :(
reviews.author: Lauren Garcia

reviews.title: Idk what\'s wrong
reviews.comment: I download and it says complete, but nothing shows up. I uninstall and reinstall and still nothing. Kinda sucks :(
reviews.author: D\'Juan Andrews

reviews.title: gr8
reviews.comment: luv thi app! cool idea to pu the pic. could add option 4 hrs/mins/seconds??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic but..
reviews.comment: Love it!!! But be better if can change date format to day/month/year as that\'s diff in Australia :)
reviews.author: Raghda Khattab

reviews.title: Its OK for the purpose
reviews.comment: As a previous reviewer said, the picture gets a bit blurry when you see it in the widget. However I was looking for an app that allowed you to use your own pic and this is good enough. Also I am used to my countdown on iPhone and would give this app 5 stars if it counted down in days, hours, minutes, seconds.
reviews.author: Yvonne McCormick

reviews.title: Love it Lg Venice
reviews.comment: It works perfectly fine. You just hard press your screen go to widget and select this widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bummed
reviews.comment: This app won\'t download on my Samsung galaxy 3
reviews.author: sexy mama

reviews.title: Won\'t install on my Samsung galaxy s3?!
reviews.comment: Tried downloading it 3 times onto my samsung galaxy s3 and each time it has said that downloading has complete but it won\'t open/show on my homepage?????!?!!
reviews.author: Emma Slater

reviews.title: It won\'t load
reviews.comment: I install it but it won\'t open! It takes me to the play store and says \'uninstall\' there\'s not even an \'open\' button in my play store for it!
reviews.author: Marisa Gutierrez

reviews.comment: Crappy. Downloaded but never showed up on phone. I\'ll keep looking for one that gets it right.
reviews.author: Sara Elizabeth

reviews.title: but!
reviews.comment: please update and fix the widget!!  it is annoying that the font will grow larger so then it over takes the picture!!  please please please fix! my rate has gone down one star because nothing has been done to have it fixed!
reviews.author: Haley Butler

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I use this when my soldier is deployed. I love being able to see his picture in the widget.
reviews.author: Crystal Ogden

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: I had to install twice to get it to work.  I prefer the ones that countdown to the second.
reviews.author: DC Gambit
